name: NexusVR
description:
NexusVR - Connecting the Metaverse.

A (soon to be social) portaling experience. Download your other Oculus demos such as the jam entries and go from one to the other all without ever leaving VR!

You can now traverse between social spaces such as VRChat, Convrge, Altspace, or JanusVR, the first connection node in the metaverse.

To have the nexus detect portals, simply place the experiences in the NexusVR/Portals folder, or make a new folder named for your experience with a _Custom.ink shortcut for things that don't want to move.

Stay a while and listen? Explore the internet with the VR browser you can just reach out and touch or take in the mysterious sights that the nexus offers. Want to watch a link on the big screen? just grab it from your page and release it to a display near you.

Follow nexusvr.io and reddit.com/r/nexusvr for updates on the project

UE WIP thread: https://forums.unrealengine.com/showthread.php?90248-NexusVR-Connecting-the-Metaverse

More images: http://imgur.com/a/HFUZS

Credits:

Visuals: Mac Cauley

Programming: Jan 'Getnamo' Kaniewski

BLUI plugin - Aaron Shea

Scalability plugin - Teddy
